content:
A month after DevDays, I'd like to say thanks again for the positive reception of QHUL - the Klingon variant of FHIR.

For those who don't know what this is about: you find one of the rare genuine QHULingon photos here: https://twitter.com/WayneKubick/status/931444088779534336 .
You might also want to test your comprehension of Klingon language and Star Trek context at https://qhul.org/ .

Since a bunch of people asked about the QHUL wear we had at DevDays (like T-Shirts, Polos, Jackets or Hoodies), I finally managed to set up a QHUL shop at Redbubble for everyone to share the QHUL experience: https://www.redbubble.com/people/qhul/

Enjoy, and feel free to PM me any suggestions.
